column6:
The British and French empires are at each other's throats, and the Exiles are barely able to catch their breath. Perhaps the help of certain wheelchair-bound mutant teacher's student body would come in handy? Meanwhile in Chinese occupied Japan, Betsy struggles to deal with Lady Mandarin and Ogun. Double your dose of alternate-reality adventure as two issues fly your way, wrapping up the third arc of New Exiles!,2008,8
Rated A ...$2.99 each
column8: | inker:Vicente Cifuentes | writer:Chris Claremont | colorist:Alex Garner | colorist:Wil Quintana | penciller:Tom Grummett | letterer:Tom Orzechowski
